did.unittitle: Richard Arnold will and book of religious writings
did.abstract: Collection comprises manuscript will of Richard Arnold, dated September 6, 1735 and notebook of writings on religious topics, dated 1725-1727. Many of the pages contain the heading "for the high schoolers." Some of the writings express anti-Quaker sentiments.
